title: Financial Strain - Gas Incident
description: Father ran out of gas at school while attempting to pick up children. Mother dismissed request for help with 'Call AAA' response.
description_neutral: Father experienced vehicle failure while attempting to exercise parenting time. Respondent declined to provide assistance.

title: PFA Filed - Emergency Protection
description: Emergency PFA filed by Respondent. Beginning of legal exclusion period.
description_neutral: Emergency Protection From Abuse order filed by Respondent, initiating legal separation period.

title: Camper Incident - Coordinated Arrest
description: Respondent invited Petitioner to retrieve camper, then coordinated arrest.
description_neutral: Respondent extended invitation for Petitioner to retrieve personal property. Law enforcement was contacted and present.

title: AppClose Access Denied
description: Father requested permission to make calls through AppClose platform. Access restricted.
description_neutral: Petitioner attempted to communicate through court-ordered parenting app. Access was denied by Respondent.

title: Reactive Text - Irony Message
description: Critical message calling out irony of felon cohabitant vs. her accusations. High-value if framed as Reactive Abuse.
description_neutral: Petitioner sent message expressing frustration regarding Respondent's choice of cohabitant. Message was intended as private journal entry but was inadvertently transmitted.
